const start = context.item.data.start_time; const end = context.item.data.end_time; if (!start || !end) return 'N/A'; const [startHour, startMin] = start.split(':').map(Number); const [endHour, endMin] = end.split(':').map(Number); const durationMin = (endHour * 60 + endMin) - (startHour * 60 + startMin); return Math.floor(durationMin/60) + 'h ' + (durationMin % 60) + 'min'

interactions.description:
Updates the enrollment dates for a student and handles form closure.

Main workflow:

  1. Updates the enrollment dates in the course_enrollments table using the selected start and end dates
  2. Refreshes the enrollments collection to show updated data
  3. Closes the edit dialog
  4. Resets the selected enrollment variable

Error workflow:

Logs any errors that occur during the update process
